sentence: Partners management HONOR places great emphasis on scientific research and innovation, and integrates patent management into the entire process of R&D, production and operation, viewing patent technology as a core competitive advantage.

In addition to continuous improvement in key technologies such as photography, operation system optimization, privacy security protection, battery technology and communication technology, we also leverage our own patent technologies to maintain our brand quality and advantages.
For example, the monthly average number of new patent applications by HONOR in China is more than 300, of which invention patents account for more than 90.
